title: French Spaced Repetition
summary: Adaptive flashcard trainer that helps learners retain French vocabulary through spaced repetition.
problem: French learners needed a study aid that reinforces vocabulary at the right cadence instead of repeating random flashcards.
approach: Modeled each vocabulary card in a PostgreSQL-backed linked list and exposed a JWT-authenticated Node/Express API that reprioritizes cards after every attempt. The React client visualizes streaks, accuracy, and upcoming cards so learners understand where to focus next.
results: Learners cycle through 40+ vocabulary cards without repetition fatigue
API integration tests guard the spaced repetition algorithm from regressions
Deployment on Vercel keeps latency low for practice sessions
